resources.string:
Quotations sorting

Press the header item to sort quotations ones by descending of appropriate parameter

Long press the item and move to resort


Instruments

To remove quotation, press \'x\' button near appropriate quotation or swipe item out

Also you can add/remove instruments on Instruments screen.

Author: Alexander Shtanko

Source code: Bitbucket
Instruments deletion was failed, check Internet connection and try again.
